entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, referred to as 'Harry'.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: A friend of Harry's, who is trying to help him escape.

entities.name: dumbledore

relationships.description: Harry is trying to help Neville escape.
Dumbledore appears and saves Harry from an unknown danger.
